sentences.sContent: The bill would have outlawed several types of guns.
sentences.sCn: 这项法案将全面禁用几种枪支。

synos.tran: 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者

words.tran: 被宣布为非法；非法化；逍遥法外

trans.tranOther: to completely stop something by making it illegal
someone who has done something illegal, and who is hiding in order to avoid punishment – used especially about criminals in the past
